Sucks gold powders nearby and adds them to your wallet
Gold dropped from enemies and gold sucked by Golden Vacuum Fields increased in value.
I sell propane and propane accessories
Casts four spells in a cross pattern
The next spell is skipped if the casting wand is below 20% mana
A dark beam of magic reminiscent of a familiar foe
Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a propane tank
Transforms every projectile currently in the air into an explosive duck
Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds.
Transmute drops of urine from nothing

Gives a projectile a rainbow colored sparkly trail

column2: A large, terrifying projectile that absorbed nearby projectiles to add to its power
Summons a cannon ball made of rats
Enemies near you take damage; the damage is higher the lower your health gets. You also take no damage from melee attacks.
Resets the cost of Perk Rerolls
If you stop for a moment, you can sense your location relative to the Mountain.
If you stop for a moment, you can sense the locations of the bosses.
If you stop for a moment, you can sense the locations of secrets.
If you stop for a moment, you can sense the locations of orbs.
Your spells are 5 times as powerful, but your maximum health becomes 100 and cannot be increased by normal hearts.
You gain faster vertical and horizontal movements
The wands you're currently carrying gain 3 additional spell slots (to a maximum of 25).
Enemies can no longer knock you back in addition to no more damage flashes.
You regain health from drinking blood. Blood doesn't affect satiation level.
Enemies have a chance to drop miniature health increases.
You bleed freezing vapour, but are immune to it and freezing.
When you pick a perk, there's a 50% chance the others won't disappear. Does NOT affect perks found here at the start of the game.
Extra Potion and Powder Sack Capacity
The potions and powder sacks you are carrying and will find later will gain an additional 100% to their base capacity.
Potion bottles are less likely to break.
